Title: Escape from Sobibor
Writer: Thomas 'Toivi' Blatt (manuscript "From the Ashes of Sobibor"), Richard Rashke (book), Reginald Rose (teleplay), Stanislaw 'Shlomo' Szmajzner (book)
Actors: Alan Arkin, Joanna Pacula, Rutger Hauer, Hartmut Becker
Plot: During WWII, the death camp at Treblinka had an escape, causing the Commandant at a similar camp in Sobibor to vow that his camp would never experience the same thing. But those who were ...
Awards: Won 2 Golden Globes. Another 1 win & 6 nominations.
